timeline.bodyText: ECS task always uses only 1 container?
timeline.author: komamitsu

replies.bodyText:
Good point!  IIUC, currently only 1 container is used in my understand.
But it might be better to support multiple containers for the future modification.
I will change it later.
replies.author: yoyama

replies.bodyText: I fixed as getting reasons from multiple containers and concatenate them.
replies.author: yoyama

timeline.bodyText: Maybe this RuntimeException doesn't contain the root cause of the task failure. We need to catch RuntimeException here?
timeline.author: komamitsu

replies.bodyText:
Ah good point. I am wondering this process.
When this method is called, the task already finished and the cause of RuntimeException is
final Task task = client.getTask(cluster, taskArn);

If we don't catch the RuntimeException, task will fail because of only getting information from AWS even though task have already finished.
But I re-considered and your pointing out may be better.
I will change it.
Thanks for your pointing out.
replies.author: yoyama

replies.bodyText: I removed catch (RuntimeException..) and fixed the related test.
replies.author: yoyama

timeline.bodyText:
Is it okay if RuntimeException is finally handled as an unexpected exception?
https://github.com/treasure-data/digdag/blob/v0_10/digdag-core/src/main/java/io/digdag/core/agent/OperatorManager.java#L174-L176
Maybe TaskExecutionException is better?
timeline.author: komamitsu

replies.author: yoyama

replies.bodyText:
I see. Throwing the same exception sounds reasonable.
@muga Just out of curiosity, was there any specific reason to use RuntimeException not TaskExecutionException? https://github.com/treasure-data/digdag/blame/85fd6bdcec06a362f1b16d8de2284168c4e35619/digdag-standards/src/main/java/io/digdag/standards/operator/PyOperatorFactory.java#L149
replies.author: komamitsu

replies.bodyText: I added ToDo comments on it for future improvements.
replies.author: yoyama

timeline.bodyText: This {  should be put in next line
timeline.author: komamitsu

timeline.bodyText: This is because the CI sometimes failed in this test.
timeline.author: yoyama

timeline.message: Fix NPE when getting errorMessage in TaskSetNotFoundException

timeline.bodyText: Maybe this line should be separated into multiple lines?
timeline.author: komamitsu

replies.bodyText: Good point. Thanks, will fix it.
replies.author: yoyama

timeline.author: komamitsu

timeline.bodyText: [just an idea] Maybe we'd better merge isFinished and statusCode into an Optional<Integer> in the future so that we can avoid unexpectedly using status code when not finished.
timeline.author: komamitsu

replies.bodyText: Make sense for me. I will add ToDo about it.
replies.author: yoyama

timeline.message: Add error message in CommandStatus and implement it in EcsCommandExecutor.
Increase wait to mitigate CI error.
Fix a test error in PyIT
Fix some issues based on the PR reviews.
Fix an issue on coding style.
Fix NPE when getting errorMessage in TaskSetNotFoundException
Fix null porcessing issue in getErrorMessageFromTask().
Minor refactoring add ToDo comment for future enhancements.
Minor refactoring add ToDo comment for future enhancements.
